casebody.data:
Friday, February 12, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-179. Bryant v. Conrad.

Cuyahoga App. No. 73408. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of trial court proceedings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents.
